title: Remembrance - second stanza primarily serves to

content.question: The second stanza (lines 5-8) primarily serves to

choices.label: dramatize the power of thoughts to sustain romantic feelings in the speaker
ponder the current connection between the speaker and the loved one
communicate the speakerâ€™s ongoing devotion to a treasured childhood memory
compare the loved one to a bird that has departed for northern latitudes

content.answer: ponder the current connection between the speaker and the loved one

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain the function of structure in a text.
